methods.name: BindDataToDataProviders
methods.comment:
Binds data to data providers
 @param QueryInstance - the instance of the query

methods.name: GenerateItems
methods.comment: Generate points from the querier and outwards in an angle

properties.name: mStepSize
properties.comment:
The step of the angle increase. Angle step must be >=1
 Smaller values generate less items

properties.name: mGenerateMirroredPoints
properties.comment: Should we also generate points for the negative angle value?

properties.name: mCenterActor
properties.comment: The actor (or actors) that will generate a cone in their facing direction
